message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a little something to start.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  It's a strong offer considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still holding most of the value.  Let's make a deal before the inflation gets out of control.
Alice, this is a fair 60/40 split. Time is running out and the inflation is working against me. Let's close this deal now.
I'm still in control. This offer is more generous than the last one, and the inflation is working against both of us.  Time is of the essence.

Alice, I'm standing firm. This is a 55/45 split in my favor.  The inflation is eating into my share with every passing round, and I'm not going to accept an unfair deal. Let's be realistic and close this.
The inflation is hurting us both, but I'm still willing to negotiate.  Let's reach an agreement before we both lose out completely.

Alice, this is non-negotiable. We split it 50/50 or we both walk away with nothing. The inflation is becoming critical, and I'm not going to accept anything less than an even split. It's time to be fair and end this.
